page.title: 04WOLDENS GARDEN CENTRE
page.content: A typical Garden Centre in our area is Woldens,in Cattlegate Road.It was established in 1956 and developed in sections over the years to the 3 acre site as seen today.Both indoor and outdoor plants are grown here, and they are open to the general public daily. 16 people are employed to do pricking out and planting in the two large oil heated greenhouses.Some plants are grown from seeds,other are imported. A computer is used for labelling the plants.Woldens mix their own compost for sale.3 people are employed in shrubs and general maintenance,4 in sales.Woldens sell a wide variety of products such as garden furniture, tools,books,plant pots,birthday cards, wrapping paper and confectionary.A forklift truck carries the heavy loads and 2 vans transport the goods.
